txt.en: Bring the overseer's key to Edhere in the Orc-mines

'We will need the keys to our cells before we can mount an effort to escape this mine. 

'While the Orcs think we are too weak to escape, they always keep a few of our companions locked in those cramped cells as hostages against our good behaviour.

'If we were to try to escape without them, they would surely be killed. The key to those cells is carried by an Orc-warden, L没nt the Overseer. If you can find him and relieve him of those keys, we can release our companions and make our attempt at freedom.'

'The overseer's key! You found it! Well then, it seems that we are as ready as we are ever going to be.\n\n'We need to get out of here now, before we grow too weak to fight at all! Are you ready for what comes next?'
Before the slaves can escape the clutches of their Orc-masters, they will need the key to their cells.
You have found the overseer's key
Defeat L没nt the Overseer and take his key
L没nt the Overseer can be found in the Orc-mines.\n\nEdhere asked you to defeat L没nt the Overseer and retrieve the cell-key he carries.
Bring the Overseer's Key to Edhere
Edhere is in the Orc-mines.\n\nYou should bring the overseer's key to Edhere.
